gaia::connectivity::BluetoothHeadset Class Reference

bool gaia::connectivity::BluetoothHeadset::isAudioConnected ( const BluetoothDevice &  device)

Check if Bluetooth SCO audio is connected.

Parameters:
deviceBluetooth headset
Returns:
true if SCO is connected, false otherwise or on error
bool gaia::connectivity::BluetoothHeadset::startVoiceRecognition ( const BluetoothDevice &  device)

Start Bluetooth voice recognition.

This methods sends the voice recognition AT command to the headset and establishes the audio connection.

Parameters:
deviceBluetooth headset
Returns:
false if there is no headset connected of if the connected headset doesn't support voice recognition or on error, true otherwise
bool gaia::connectivity::BluetoothHeadset::stopVoiceRecognition ( const BluetoothDevice &  device)

Stop Bluetooth Voice Recognition mode, and shut down the Bluetooth audio path.

Parameters:
deviceBluetooth headset
Returns:
false if there is no headset connected or on error, true otherwise
